description: Creates a folder in which items can be placed. Folders are only visible to a user and solely used for organizing content within that user's content space. The create user folder operation (POST only) is available only on the user's root folder. Multilevel folders are not supported. The user provides the title for the folder, which must be unique to that user. The folder ID is generated by the system. http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/arcgis-rest-api/#/Create_Folder/02r300000074000000/
title: createFolder

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful

folder.description: Folder JSON object that describes the folder just created

username.description: The username of the person who created the folder
